dcterms:description: An experimental dataset for vehicle sideslip angle estimation, used to tune the process noise parameters of an Unscented Kalman Filter (UKF).
dcterms:title: Experimental dataset for vehicle sideslip angle estimation

dcterms:creator: H. Heidfeld
M. Sch√ºnemann
R. Kasper
dcterms:description: A real-world experimental dataset composed of 216 manoeuvres recorded at the Automotive Testing Papenburg GmbH, covering a wide range of vehicle behaviours.
dcterms:title: Real-world experimental dataset composed of 216 manoeuvres

dcterms:description: A training set composed of 8 manoeuvres selected from the real-world experimental dataset for tuning the UKF.
dcterms:title: Training set composed of 8 manoeuvres

dcterms:description: A test set composed of 23 manoeuvres selected from the real-world experimental dataset to evaluate the generalization capability of the approach.
dcterms:title: Test set composed of 23 manoeuvres
